bibl.title: Territory of Washington v James Sheridan. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Walla Walla County Government; Clerk, Territorial Court Civil/Criminal Case Files, 1860-1889

div1.p: County of Walla Walla SS United States District Court First Judicial District
To S.B. Fargo, E.S. Bridges and St Apperson

In the name of the United States, you are hereby commanded to be and appear before the said Court forthwith at the Court House in the City of Walla Walla, in said county, on the 1st day of May 1863 at o'clock to give evidence in a cause wherein Territory Plaintiff and James Sheridan Defendant on the part of Territory
Witness my hand, and the seal of said Court this 1st day of May A.D. 1863 B.N. Sexton, Clerk

I hereby certify that I have served the within subpoena by reading the same to S.B. Fargo and E.S. Bridges in the county of Walla Walla this 2nd day of May 1863. St Apperson not to be found E.B. Whitman, Sheriff
Territory vs James Sheridan Subpoena Filed May 2nd 1863 B.N. Sexton clerk by L.E. Rector deputy clerk
